original_text: and have put on the new self, which is being renewed in knowledge after the image of its creator.
korean_text: 새 사람을 입었으니 이는 자기를 창조하신 이의 형상을 따라 지식에까지 새롭게 하심을 입은 자니라

sentences.original_text: and have put on the new self
which is being renewed in knowledge
after the image of its creator
